content.raw:
This looks really nice! 

I did a bit of testing and other than a few exceptions due to Plugin Tabs \(which are not mainline yet\) not having a function`get_builtin_save_data` everything worked as advertised.

It is a bit confusing that exceptions and error messages are not posted in red but FutureWarnings are. But this can not really be helped I guess as they are printed to the stdout and not to stderr.
content.html:
This looks really nice!

I did a bit of testing and other than a few exceptions due to Plugin Tabs (which are not mainline yet) not having a functionget_builtin_save_data everything worked as advertised.

It is a bit confusing that exceptions and error messages are not posted in red but FutureWarnings are. But this can not really be helped I guess as they are printed to the stdout and not to stderr.
